snippet: At a luncheon for "Les Miz," the 10-year-old actress who plays young Cosette confessed to falling asleep at the film's New York premiere -- but it's not what you think.
abstract: At a luncheon for "Les Miz," the 10-year-old actress who plays young Cosette confessed to falling asleep at the film's New York premiere -- but it's not what you think.

headline.main: A Sleepy Cosette and a Hungover Fantine
